definitions.definition: An alcoholic beverage made by fermenting the juice of grapes.
definitions.example: She ordered some wine for the meal.

definitions.definition: An alcoholic beverage made by fermenting the juice of fruits or vegetables other than grapes, usually preceded by the type of the fruit or vegetable; for example, "dandelion wine".

definitions.example: I'd like three beers and two wines, please.

definitions.definition: A dark purplish red colour; the colour of red wine.
